price: 13. Dheh: Waxaan ka cabsan haddaan ku caasiyo Rabbigey Cadaab Maalin Daran.
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ إِنۡ عَصَيۡتُ رَبِّي عَذَابَ يَوۡمٍ عَظِيمٖ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qul innī akhāfu in ʿaṣaytu rabbī ʿadhāba yawmin ʿaẓīmin
